{{letter_head or ''}}

Dated : {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.offer_date, "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}

TO,
{{doc.applicant_name or ""}}
{% set address = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "current_address") %} {{address or ""}}




Sub: Offer for the post of a "{{doc.designation or ""}}" at Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd, Ahmedabad.



Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ""}}



This is with the reference to your application and the subsequent interviews; we are pleased to offer you the post of a "{{doc.designation or ""}}" at Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd, Ahmedabad.


Your yearly emoluments would be {% set ctc = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "ctc") %} Rs {{ctc or ""}}(CTC per Years/CTC Per month/ Gross per year /Gross per month) Broken into fixed and variable components in annexure II. The allowances, benefits and other terms and conditions of your employment will be as per Company's Policies as may be in force from time to time.


You should report to your duties on {% set date = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "date_of_joining") %} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(date, "dd-MMM-yyyy") }}


You are requested to submit the following documents to HR Dept. at the time of joining.

  • 3 Passport Size Photographs.
  • Photocopies of all Educational Certificates.
  • ID proof (Passport / PAN Card /Voter Card)
  • Residential Proof. (Aadhar card).
  • Experience Certificates
  • 3 months Previous Company Pay Slips
  • Relieving Letter of the previous Company.
  • Biodata /CV

Your initial appointment will be on probation for a period of six Months from the date of your joining and will automatically get confirmed at the end of the probation period. Kindly confirm the receipt of this offer by email and confirm the exact joining date. Please sign the hard copy of this offer letter in token of your acceptance and courier it back to us ASAP. We wish you good luck and we look forward to your working with us. We wish you all Success



For Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd





Authorized Signatory.

{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
